animals.name: Lion
animals.imageCredit: Lion image showcasing its majestic mane and powerful presence
animals.description: The lion is one of Africa's most iconic predators, known for living in prides and their distinctive roar that can be heard up to 8km away.

animals.name: Elephant
animals.imageCredit: African elephant displaying its impressive tusks and gentle nature
animals.description: The African elephant is the largest land mammal on Earth. They are highly intelligent and social animals living in matriarch-led family groups.

animals.name: Giraffe
animals.imageCredit: Giraffe showing its distinctive spotted pattern and long neck
animals.description: Giraffes are the world's tallest mammals. Their distinctive neck helps them reach leaves other herbivores cannot access.

animals.name: Rhino
animals.imageCredit: Image 4: Caretaker with a resting rhino showing their close bond
animals.description: The black rhino is one of the most endangered large mammals in Africa, primarily due to poaching for their horns.

animals.name: Cheetah
animals.imageCredit: Image 5: Artistic illustration of a running cheetah on savanna
animals.description: The cheetah is the fastest land animal, capable of reaching speeds up to 70 mph in short bursts.

animals.name: Leopard
animals.imageCredit: Leopard showing its beautiful spotted coat pattern
animals.description: Leopards are powerful big cats known for their climbing abilities and beautiful spotted coat pattern.

animals.name: Zebra
animals.imageCredit: Zebra displaying its distinctive black and white stripe pattern
animals.description: Zebras are known for their distinctive black and white stripes, which are unique to each individual like human fingerprints.

animals.name: Hyena
animals.imageCredit: Image 2: Black and white illustration of a hyena standing in water
animals.description: Spotted hyenas are highly social animals known for their distinctive calls and exceptional hunting abilities.

animals.name: Impala
animals.imageCredit: Image 3: Side view of an Impala with long curved horns
animals.description: Impalas are graceful antelopes known for their impressive leaping abilities, capable of jumping up to 3 meters high.

animals.name: Chameleon
animals.imageCredit: Image 1: Close-up of a colorful chameleon with blue and orange coloring
animals.description: The chameleon is known for its ability to change colors and its independently moving eyes that can rotate 360 degrees.
